item.title: OverTheWire.org Bandit Level 11 -> Level 12
item.description: http://overthewire.org/wargames/bandit/bandit12.html Bandit Level 11 → Level 12 Level Goal The password for the next level is stored in the file data.txt, where all lowercase (a-z) and uppercase (A-Z) letters have been rotated by 13 positions Commands you may need to solve this level grep, sort, uniq, strings, base64, tr, tar, gzip, bzip2, xxd Helpful Reading Material Rot13 on Wikipedia Level 11에서 Level 12로 가기 위해 data.txt 파일 안에 있는 비밀번호를 찾아야 한다.
